name: Hero's Journey
description: Classic transformation arc following protagonist through adventure and return with wisdom
key_questions: Who is the hero?|What's their ordinary world?|What call disrupts their world?|What trials do they face?|How are they transformed?

name: Pixar Story Spine
description: Emotional narrative structure using once upon a time framework that builds tension to resolution
key_questions: Once upon a time what?|Every day what happened?|Until one day what changed?|Because of that what?|Until finally how resolved?

name: Customer Journey
description: Narrative following customer transformation from pain point through solution to success
key_questions: What was the before struggle?|What discovery moment occurred?|How did they implement?|What transformation happened?|What's their new reality?

name: Challenge Overcome
description: Dramatic structure centered on confronting and conquering significant obstacles
key_questions: What obstacle blocked progress?|How did stakes escalate?|What was the darkest moment?|What breakthrough occurred?|What was learned?

name: Character Arc
description: Personal evolution story showing growth through experience and struggle
key_questions: Who are they at start?|What forces change?|What do they resist?|What breakthrough shifts them?|Who have they become?

name: Brand Story
description: Authentic narrative communicating brand values mission and unique market position
key_questions: What sparked this brand?|What core values drive it?|How does it impact customers?|What makes it different?|Where is it heading?

name: Vision Narrative
description: Future-focused story painting vivid picture of desired state and path to get there
key_questions: What's the current reality?|What opportunity emerges?|What's the bold vision?|What's the strategic path?|What does transformed future look like?

name: Origin Story
description: Foundational narrative explaining how something came to be and why it matters today
key_questions: What was the spark moment?|What early struggles occurred?|What key breakthrough happened?|How did it evolve?|What's the current mission?

name: Positioning Story
description: Narrative establishing unique market position and competitive differentiation
key_questions: What market gap exists?|How are you uniquely qualified?|What makes your approach different?|Why should audience care?|What future do you enable?

name: Culture Story
description: Internal narrative defining organizational values behaviors and identity
key_questions: What principles guide deinnovationions?|What behaviors exemplify culture?|What stories illustrate values?|How do people experience it?|What culture are you building?

name: Pitch Narrative
description: Compelling story structure designed to inspire action investment or partnership
key_questions: What problem landscape exists?|What's your vision for solution?|What proof validates approach?|What's the opportunity size?|What action do you want?

name: Sales Story
description: Customer-centric narrative demonstrating value and building desire for solution
key_questions: What pain do they feel?|How do you understand it?|What solution transforms situation?|What results can they expect?|What's the path forward?

name: Change Story
description: Narrative making case for transformation and mobilizing people through transition
key_questions: Why can't we stay here?|What does better look like?|What's at stake if we don't?|How do we get there?|What's in it for them?

name: Fundraising Story
description: Emotionally compelling narrative connecting donor values to mission impact
key_questions: What problem breaks hearts?|What solution creates hope?|What impact will investment make?|Why is this urgent?|How can they help?

name: Advocacy Story
description: Story galvanizing support for cause movement or policy change
key_questions: What injustice demands attention?|Who is affected and how?|What change is needed?|What happens if we act?|How can they join?

name: Data Storytelling
description: Transform data insights into compelling narrative with clear actionable takeaways
key_questions: What context is needed?|What data reveals insight?|What patterns explain it?|So what why does it matter?|What actions should follow?

name: Case Study
description: Detailed narrative documenting real-world application results and learnings
key_questions: What was the situation?|What approach was taken?|What challenges emerged?|What results were achieved?|What lessons transfer?

name: Research Narrative
description: Story structure presenting research findings in accessible engaging way
key_questions: What question drove research?|How was it investigated?|What did you discover?|What does it mean?|What are implications?

name: Insight Narrative
description: Narrative revealing non-obvious truth or pattern that shifts understanding
key_questions: What did everyone assume?|What did you notice?|What deeper pattern emerged?|Why does it matter?|What should change?

name: Process Story
description: Behind-the-scenes narrative showing how something was made or accomplished
key_questions: What was being created?|What approach was chosen?|What challenges arose?|How were they solved?|What was learned?

name: Hook Driven
description: Story structure maximizing emotional engagement through powerful opening and touchpoints
key_questions: What surprising fact opens?|What urgent question emerges?|Where are emotional peaks?|What creates relatability?|What payoff satisfies?

name: Conflict Resolution
description: Narrative centered on tension building and satisfying resolution of core conflict
key_questions: What's the central conflict?|Who wants what and why?|What prevents resolution?|How does tension escalate?|How is it resolved?

name: Empathy Story
description: Story designed to create emotional connection and understanding of other perspectives
key_questions: Whose perspective are we taking?|What do they experience?|What do they feel?|Why should audience care?|What common ground exists?

name: Human Interest
description: Personal story highlighting universal human experiences and emotions
key_questions: Who is at the center?|What personal stakes exist?|What universal themes emerge?|What emotional journey occurs?|What makes it relatable?

name: Vulnerable Story
description: Authentic personal narrative sharing struggle failure or raw truth to build connection
key_questions: What truth is hard to share?|What struggle was faced?|What was learned?|Why share this now?|What hope does it offer?
